3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have height and thickness as required. The perspective is a shallow angled view. Interior volume is perceivable but the rendering style remains very flat.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Extremely high fidelity to the original floor plan layout. All room adjacencies and wall positions are maintained accurately.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement and scale match the 2D source exactly.

visual_clarity.notes: Significant point deduction for UI contamination: the original text labels and dimensions are baked into the 3D surfaces, which reduces structural clarity and professionalism.

detected_errors.description: Text labels and dimensions from the 2D plan are visible on the 3D floor and wall surfaces.

summary: A geometrically faithful 3D extrusion that preserves the layout perfectly, though it suffers from baked-in text labels on the floor surfaces.
